DESCRIPTION: Date when the insurance policy became effective
Name of the employer group or plan sponsor
First name of the primary insured/subscriber
Last name of the primary insured/subscriber
Date of birth of the primary insured/subscriber
First name of the patient/claimant receiving services
Last name of the patient/claimant receiving services
Date of birth of the patient/claimant
Start date of the medical service or treatment
Unique identifier for the claim in the system
End date of the medical service or treatment
Date when the claim was processed/adjudicated
Primary ICD diagnosis code for the claim
Secondary ICD diagnosis code for the claim
Current Procedural Terminology code for the service
Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System code
Revenue code identifying the type of service/department
CPT/HCPCS modifier code providing additional service details
Type of insurance product (e.g. HMO PPO POS)
National Provider Identifier for the rendering provider
Name of the prescription drug dispensed
Quantity of medication dispensed
Number of days the prescription should last
Date the prescription was filled at the pharmacy
Total amount billed by the provider for services
Fixed amount the member pays at time of service
Amount applied to the member annual deductible
Percentage-based amount the member pays after deductible
Maximum amount the plan will pay for the service
Net payment amount after all adjustments
Amount not covered due to plan exclusions
Coordination of Benefits amount from other insurance
Other reductions or adjustments to the claim
Amount denied due to claim errors or policy limits
Final amount paid by the insurance plan
Type of service line (e.g. Medical Pharmacy Dental)
Name of the entity receiving payment
Mailing address of the payee
Tax Identification Number of the payee
